title: The Opportunities and Challenges of ChatGPT in Higher Education
description: A global policy-based case study analysing AI adoption in universities. Covered academic integrity risks, responsible AI integration, evolving institutional policies, and the balance between AI efficiency and human mentorship in learning environments.

title: Singapore Employment Analytics Dashboard
description: Interactive Streamlit dashboard analyzing employment, income, and job market trends across Singapore from 2015–2024, with AI-powered insights.

title: ESG Analytics — Machine Learning & Dashboard Project
description: Comprehensive ESG analysis using financial data, sustainability reports, machine learning models, clustering, and sentiment analysis. Includes ESG–financial correlation studies, Random Forest & CART models, sector-wise analytics, and an interactive dashboard for company-level ESG insights.

title: Data Science at Target — Strategic Analysis Presentation
description: Analyzed Target’s evolution into a data-driven retail leader, covering EDABI, personalization systems, supply-chain analytics, experimentation culture, and post-breach digital transformation. Recommended data-driven influencer strategy, trend-surfing analytics, and enhanced personalization models.

title: Hotel Booking Cancellation Analysis
description: End-to-end analytical project predicting hotel booking cancellations using data exploration, machine learning models, and customer segmentation. Includes EDA, logistic regression, CART, random forest, model evaluation, and K-Means clustering for risk-based customer segmentation.

title: Driving Sustainability & Health with Innovative Millet-Based Solutions
description: Sales Management project focusing on sustainable millet-based business strategies combining innovation, eco-conscious branding, and data-driven decision-making.

title: Car Price Analysis
description: Performed ANOVA, regression, and EDA to identify key pricing drivers and visualized insights through dashboards.

title: Laptop Price Prediction (Machine Learning Project)
description: End-to-end machine learning workflow predicting laptop prices using regression models. Includes data preprocessing, feature engineering, exploratory data analysis, visualizations, and model evaluation.

title: Calories Burnt Predictor (Machine Learning Project)
description: Built a machine learning model to predict calories burnt based on exercise and physiological parameters. Includes data preprocessing, feature selection, EDA, model training, and performance evaluation.

title: Sustainable Packaging Research
description: Conducted Primary and Secondary research to reveal brand trust (+148%) and environmental awareness (+64%) as key drivers for sustainable packaging adoption and loyalty.

title: Metaverse Marketing Research Paper
description: Published paper analysing 20 virtual worlds and 100 surveys to develop virtual branding strategies.

title: Blockchain-Based Supply Chain Transparency in Marketing , Research Paper
description: Explores how blockchain enhances trust and traceability in product promotion through transparency-driven marketing strategies.
